title: The Moment Bobby’s Girlfriend Knew He Was The One + Amy’s Daughter Makes Case For TV In Her Room + Tour Guide From Villisca Axe Murder House On If It’s Haunted
itunes:title: The Moment Bobby’s Girlfriend Knew He Was The One + Amy’s Daughter Makes Case For TV In Her Room + Tour Guide From Villisca Axe Murder House On If It’s Haunted
description:
Bobby shares songs that remind him of his girlfriend and the moment she knew he was the one. Amy’s daughter records her case on why she should be allowed to have a TV in her room. We talk to Johnny who is a tour guide from the murder house that we are sending Lunchbox to in Iowa. He answers our questions on if the house is really haunted.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
